articles.description: Bose’s QuietComfort Earbuds II have the best ANC you can get in wireless buds, and they’re $249. There are also deals on the Acer Chromebook Spin 514, Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, and both JBL Flip 6 and Charge 5 Bluetooth speakers.

articles.title: Nothing Confirms an Ear (2) Earbuds Announcement On March 22 - Gizmodo
articles.description: The Nothing Ear (2) wireless earbuds will be a follow-up to the company's very first product, the Ear (1).
